page.title: 15BURTON SALMON HOME LIFE 2
page.content: Inside A House. My house is built of bricks. It has a red roof made of tiles. The front door is wood with a glass panel in the middle. We have carpets on the floors but in the kitchen we have lino tiles and a rug. In the living room we have two sofas to sit on. In the corner we have a television to watch. We have wall units with books and ornaments in. The fireplace is made of tiles and it has ornaments on as well. The fire is a coal fire. We have a brass coal scuttle with pictures of horses on. It stays near the fire but the coal is kept outside in a bunker. The walls are covered with different shaped bricks. We have painted them. The other rooms have wallpaper on them.
